name: Zombie Soccer
description:
Zombie Soccer is the latest and most awesome zombie football game on AppStore. Download this scary zombie game and play this unique soccer game. Do you have what it takes to survive and win? Are you smarter than the horde of scary zombies trying to beat you down? Control the soccer ball and don’t let any zombie score a goal!
We know that many people are looking for exciting scary games to play that challenge their bravery and their game playing skill at the same time. This is why we create this ultimate soccer game that takes you beyond ordinary arcade games that you usually play. Whether you are a fan of football or zombie games, you will love Zombie Soccer. This 3D soccer games combine the excitement of playing football and the thrill of playing scary games. Don’t just play boring arcade games.
Most zombie games require you to avoid or kill the evil creatures that roam the earth. Zombie Soccer is different from other zombie games because the objective of this zombie football game is to win against the zombie team. This is not a funny soccer game! The running zombies are very powerful and fast so you have to use all of your agility and pass or shoot the soccer ball with high accuracy. Enjoy hours of fun gameplay in 15 levels of this crazy football app.
*****************************************
Zombie Soccer HIGHLIGHTED FEATURES:
*****************************************
• Download our crazy football game and play this Halloween themed game whenever you want.
• Survive and win against the horde of strong running zombies trying to beat you in this football round.
• Awesome 3D effect that will mesmerize you while you play.
• Immersive sound that will add thrills and chills to your spine while you are playing.
• Great gameplay with easy on screen control for shooting, passing and tackling.
• High difficulty to master, which keep you on your toes during the game.
• Countless hours of intense gameplay with 15 different levels with increasing difficulty and smarter zombies!
• Feel the tension as the strong zombies trying to corner you with their scary faces.
• Practice playing soccer on your device. The fear of getting eaten by hungry monsters will only motivate you to play better!
Forget playing funny soccer games or other ordinary arcade games. Try out something more challenging and intense. Challenge yourself if you have what it takes to survive in the scariest situation and even win playing football against horde of scary monsters, even scarier than other creatures that haunted the Halloween night. These monsters won’t stop from beating you up and eating you alive! You won’t survive if you don’t use all your agility and soccer playing skill. Watch your back because these running zombies are after you. They are extremely dangerous but we know you can beat them all if you try.
So what are you waiting for? Play this ultimate 3D Soccer games simulation against the running zombies. Feel the intensity of playing against these monster and trying to survive at the same time. Are you brave enough to venture in this dark world? You are not a coward are you? Can you beat all 15 levels of zombie soccer games? Or will you be eaten by these monster in the first level?
The material of this game contains scary theme and is not suitable for young children.
Please direct any issue to our email address (argcondor@gmail.com). We really appreciate it if you can leave a rating and review to support us!
